document.full_text: marius holtet scored four goals and norway beat france 5-2 to clinch the final spot in the quarterfinals of the ice hockey world championship on monday.
document.title: norway advances to quarterfinals at hockey worlds
lines_and_colors: marius holtet scored four goals and norway beat france 5-2 to clinch the final spot in the quarterfinals of the ice hockey world championship on monday.
